1.title: East Coast Beaches
1.plot: Pack your bags, we're diving into the hottest, tastiest, sun-drenched hotspots on the planet. From Coney Island hot dogs to Cyprus sea caves and monasteries, it's beach or bust. The countdown to the No.1 hotspot starts here.

2.title: 101 Sand n' Surf Hotspots: 80 to 61
2.plot: We're visiting 20 more of the most amazing and exotic destinations on our countdown to No. 1. From scuba diving off the coast of Isla Mujeres, Mexico, to kite-surfing in Tarifa, Spain, it's time to set sail and let loose with the next batch of Sand n' Surf Hotspots.

10.title: 101 Sand n' Surf Hotspots: 20 to 1
10.plot: We've reached the final hour of the best 101 Sand n' Surf Hotspots across the globe, and the top 20 are out of this world. Swim with hungry sharks in South Africa, island-hop through the Palm Islands in Dubai, and feast your eyes on our No. 1 spot.

imdb.plot outline: 101 Sand n' Surf Hotspots showcases the hottest sandy destinations across the globe. Each of the 5 hour-long specials features a countdown of top vacation locations and dives into what makes them paradise on Earth. From the black-sand beaches in Hawaii to kite surfing in Australia and an underwater spa in the Maldives, experience each destination as a true insider and discover top-rated, mouthwatering eats, unique new resorts, fun family activities, breathtaking adventures, ancient ruins to explore, unusual cultural happenings and, of course, one-of-a-kind scenery.
imdb.title: 101 Sand n' Surf Hotspots
plot: _101 Sand n' Surf Hotspots_ (qv) showcases the hottest sandy destinations across the globe. Each of the 5 hour-long specials features a countdown of top vacation locations and dives into what makes them paradise on Earth. From the black-sand beaches in Hawaii to kite surfing in Australia and an underwater spa in the Maldives, experience each destination as a true insider and discover top-rated, mouthwatering eats, unique new resorts, fun family activities, breathtaking adventures, ancient ruins to explore, unusual cultural happenings and, of course, one-of-a-kind scenery.
